DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Smoking Past Seven Days Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether a person smoked a cigarette, even a puff, in the past 7 days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Tobacco Smoking Past Seven Days Indicator
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._Before the present time._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied._A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one._A unit of measurement of time equal to 24 hours.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredName: Tobacco Smoking Past Seven Day Indicator
Property.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:Before the present time.:A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21
